name: Prana Summit Joggers - Women's
description:
Stretchy fabric, articulated knees and stretch-jersey waistband provide a secure yet flexible fit. A mid-rise waist provides coverage during downward dog or deadlifts. The DWR finish sheds light rain and mud in case your walk to the gym is a little stormy.Fabric has DWR finish to repel light rain and mud.Waistband is Chakara® performance stretch jersey for a secure fit.Adjustable elastic in hem allows for customized cinching.Standard fit with mid rise adding coverage.

        Sustainability
